sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组动词均可表示"集中，归拢"之意。
means: gather ： 换用，但多强调按照一定目的或计划进行有选择的收集。
assemble与collect相比更为突出聚集或收集的目的。

sentence.Network_en: Greenpeace managed to assemble enough boats to waylay the ship at sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 绿色和平组织设法聚集起足够数量的小船在海上拦截该船。

sentence.Network_en: There wasn't even a convenient place for students to assemble between classes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在课间，学生们连一个方便凑在一起的地方都没有。

sentence.Network_en: In the evening, the people assemble in the mosques.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上，人们聚集到清真寺里。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French asembler, based on Latin ad- 'to' + simul 'together'

entry.def: When people assemble or when someone assembles them, they come together in a group, usually for a particular purpose such as a meeting.

example.ex: There wasn't even a convenient place for students to assemble between classes...
example.tran: 在课间，学生们连一个方便凑在一起的地方都没有。

example.ex: Thousands of people, mainly Zulus, assembled in a stadium in Thokoza...
example.tran: 数以千计的人，主要是祖鲁族人，聚集在托考查的一个体育场里。

entry.def: To assemble something means to collect it together or to fit the different parts of it together.

example.ex: Greenpeace managed to assemble enough boats to waylay the ship at sea...
example.tran: 绿色和平组织设法聚集起足够数量的小船在海上拦截该船。

example.ex: She had been trying to assemble the bomb when it went off in her arms...
example.tran: 在她试图组装炸弹时，炸弹在她怀里爆炸了。

sentences.sentence: "get together all those who are interested in the project"

auth_sentence.content: Diligently, I assemble a crack team of specialists.
auth_sentence.res_content: Diligently, I assemble a crack team of specialists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Diligently, I assemble a crack team of specialists.

auth_sentence.content: Assemble the joint, tapping the wedge into position.
auth_sentence.res_content: Assemble the joint, tapping the wedge into position.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Assemble the joint, tapping the wedge into position.

auth_sentence.content: When the filling has cooled, assemble the pie.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 装配, 集会, 集结, 汇编
stems_affixes.word_buile: assemble[v.集合,召集;装配;收集 v.集合,聚集]+y状态,性质→assembly
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance表名词→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
sembl相类似,一样+ance表名词→相同之处
as不断+sembl相类似,一样+e→不断[走向]同一个地方→召集
dis不+sembl相类似,一样+e→不想同装做相同→掩饰
re再,加强+sembl相类似,一样+e→v.像,类似

Sentence.sentence: He was good at assembling bookshelves.
Instead, the company said Tuesday, its employees will ask parents whether they prefer such options as milk or sliced apples before assembling the meals.
First, there is the way the data is assembled.
statisticians improve their data assembling methods

During the presidential campaign, Barack Obama assembled a racially and ideologically diverse coalition with his message of hope and change; as the reality of life under a new administration settles in, some of those supporters might become disillusioned.

jushi.english: All the six graders assembled in the school hall.
jushi.chinese: 所有六年级学生都聚集在学校礼堂。

jushi.english: The whole city solemnly assembled on the square.
jushi.chinese: 全市人民在广场上隆重集会。
